## Headliners

- New UI: cleaner, more inclusive, faster to navigate
- Multiâ€‘layout workspace: 1/2/3 panels â€” switch instantly
- Persistent tabs: your tools and order stick across switches
- Powerful shortcuts: layout, focus, open/close â€” all from the keyboard
- Editable AI tools: add, remove, and edit your tool list anytime
- Settings overhaul: fullâ€‘height panel, better organization, tighter spacing

## Tabs that just make sense

- Opening a tool in singleâ€‘panel keeps it; new tool opens alongside when expanding
- Deterministic order (no random swaps); dragless clarity
- Shrinking layouts closes only the rightâ€‘most tabs â€” your primary stays

## Quality of life

- Start behavior refined: hidden only on autostart; manual launch shows now
- Close to tray; oneâ€‘click tray toggle for instant return
- Clear toasts for open/focus so you always know what happened
